items.content_html: Lightweight state management library with support for asynchronous jobs and simple change subscription
items.title: adv0cat/quench-store: Lightweight state management library with support for asynchronous jobs and simple change subscription

items.content_html: LightSAP is a lightweight universal web programming framework based on configuration and policy, as well as original text programming technology. It can serve as the backend for enterprise MIS, RPA, host computer, and O&M automation systems, as well as suitable for C-end applications such as portal websites, blogs, online drives, e-commerce, etc.
items.title: Liggin2019/Ligg.LightSAP: LightSAP is a lightweight universal web programming framework based on configuration and policy, as well as original text programming technology. It can serve as the backend for enterprise MIS, RPA, host computer, and O&M automation systems, as well as suitable for C-end applications such as portal websites, blogs, online drives, e-commerce, etc.
